marklogic.body: So, seriously, what is the point of Spring Training if, when you have a guy who can't even Reach the Mendoza line in BA with his arm out-stretched essentially guaranteed a Spot in the starting line-up, while two other guys vying for potentially the same position (and busting their tails, as well) Â thoroughly outhit him - I mean, in BA, OBP, SLG and K's - it's not even close!Â I feel bad for both Harrison and Navarro - they are getting shafted by this arrangement, and I am willing to bet that the W/Ls when Pedro starts will reflect this sorry state of affairs.Â It is a nothing short or both a mockery and a travesty!
